Room.Name: Myrr Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Myrr Lane, a major east-west street on the north side of Kista.
Room.LongDescription: Several factories and stores are along the north side of the street. The closest one seems to be associated with the Institute of Investigations into Ball Lightning. the roof seems to have an array of lightning rods mounted very close together. The Great Observatory is on the south side.
